name: Robovenger
description:
Robovenger - In this action-packed platformer, you will take command of a very agile and bouncy robot! Your task is simple - collect as many rubies as possible in the mines and don't fall into the clutches of the enemy! Accurately jump on treacherous platforms that can take you to the abyss and jump over enemies and their shots to get as deep as possible into the mine and improve your score.

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack
